examples.text: the danger of discrimination becoming institutionalized

definitions: established as part of an official organization

examples.text: one of the most insidious byproducts of the Cold War, institutionalized secrecy

shortDefinitions: established as part of official organization

definitions: (of a person) apathetic and dependent after a long period in an institution

examples.text: I became less institutionalized, more able to function as an individual

shortDefinitions: apathetic and dependent after long period in institution
